8th International Conference on Scalable Vector Graphics
August 30 to September 1, 2010
Paris, France

= Abstract =

Paper title: SVG-edit

Paper subtitle: A complete vector graphics editor in the browser

Authors: Rusnak, Pavol

Paper topic: Graphic Design with SVG -or- Interactivity and Scripting -or- SVG Authoring Tools and Techniques

Abstract (400-800 words):

SVG-edit is a fast, web-based, Javascript-driven SVG editor that works in any modern browser. It's built around open-source components like jQuery and itself is licensed under Apache License 2.0, so it's easy to embed into both non-commercial and commercial projects. ...
